channel.title: dd-wrt on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in dd-wrt on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Disabling external access to the DD-WRT WebGui
item.description: So, playing with DynDNS and DD-WRT I worryingly observed that even if I set Administration->Management->Remote Access->Web GUI Management to off I can still ****access my router’s management WebGui via the external address. That seemed wrong, I was about to set firewall rules to block this unitl I tried from my phone using 3G. The WebGui was inaccessible. The WAN WebGui still works from the INSIDE! But don’t worry it won’t work from outside your network.
